mapper.select: SELECT a.attach_seq, a.board_seq, a.board_type_seq, a.org_file_nm, a.save_path, a.chng_file_nm, a.file_size, a.file_type, a.access_uri, a.reg_dtm, a.hit FROM board_attach a JOIN ( SELECT org_file_nm, MAX(hit) as max_hit FROM board_attach GROUP BY org_file_nm ORDER BY max_hit DESC LIMIT 10 ) b ON a.org_file_nm = b.org_file_nm AND a.hit = b.max_hit;

SELECT b.board_seq, b.board_type_seq, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.del_yn, b.reg_dtm, b.reg_member_seq, m.member_id AS regMemberId, m.member_nm AS regMemberNm, b.update_dtm, b.update_member_seq, bt.board_type_nm FROM board b JOIN board_type bt ON bt.board_type_seq = b.board_type_seq JOIN member m ON m.member_seq = b.reg_member_seq ORDER BY b.hit DESC LIMIT 3;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contact_me (name, email, inquiry, message, reg_dtm) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{inquiry}, #{message}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'))
